name: Plague Dodgeball
description:
Global Game Jam 2018  - Transmission (48h)

https://globalgamejam.org/2018/games/plague-dodgeball

Modern day's dodgeball ancestor, the Plague Dodgeball is a very simple sport where each opponent try to contaminate all of his opponent's experiment subjects.

Controls : [Require 2 gamepads]
Left Stick - Move
Right Stick - Aim
Right Button - Throw / Catch

Made by :
Constantin Liétard
Clara Coolen
Tanguy Gringoire
Thomas Denis
